description: Complete hammer curl focused workout for maximum bicep and forearm development

exercises.name: Warm-up Arm Circles
exercises.instructions: Arm circles forward 30s, backward 30s, shoulder rolls 30s, wrist circles 30s

exercises.name: Classic Hammer Curl
exercises.instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart, hold dumbbells with palms facing inward (neutral grip). Keep elbows close to torso, curl up to shoulder height, squeeze biceps at top, lower slowly.

exercises.name: Alternating Hammer Curl
exercises.instructions: Start with both dumbbells at sides. Curl one arm at a time, alternating without resting. Keep the non-working arm relaxed.

exercises.name: Hammer Curl to Shoulder Press
exercises.instructions: Start with hammer curl position, after reaching top position, press dumbbells overhead. Lower to hammer curl position, then to sides.

exercises.name: Resistance Band Hammer Curl
exercises.instructions: Stand on resistance band, hold ends with neutral grip. Keep tension on band throughout movement, curl up maintaining neutral wrist position.

exercises.name: Isometric Hammer Curl Hold
exercises.instructions: Hold dumbbells at 90-degree angle in hammer curl position. Maintain this contraction without moving for specified time.

exercises.name: Reverse Grip Hammer Curl
exercises.instructions: Hold dumbbells with palms facing down (pronated grip). Curl up maintaining this grip to challenge forearms differently.

exercises.name: Cool Down Stretch
exercises.instructions: Biceps stretch 60s each arm, forearm stretch 45s each arm, shoulder stretch 30s each arm

progression.week1-2: Focus on perfect form, moderate weight
progression.week5+: Add drop sets or supersets for advanced training

tips: Keep wrists neutral throughout the movement
Focus on squeezing the biceps at the top
Breathe out on the curl up, breathe in on the way down
